item.title: Zapotechnica
item.description: Cocktail Fruity and complex, this smoky crowd-pleasing sour goes down way too easy. 2 oz Mezcal* ¼ oz Chartreuse Yellow 1 oz Grilled Pineapple Cordial ¾ oz lime juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain over new ice in rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel perched on top of the drink, sprinkled with some finishing salt. *Recommended: Del Maguey Vida, El Silencio, Creyente Joven, Banhez Joven Espadín y Barril

item.title: Junction Paloma
item.description: Cocktail Salty, refreshing and effervescent, this non-traditional take on the Mexican classic is sure to be a crowd-pleaser. 1 ½ oz 100% Agave Blanco Tequila* ½ oz Aperol ½ oz lime juice ¾ oz Salted Grapefruit Cordial 1 oz still water Assemble all ingredients, add ice, then carbonate**. Shake, then strain into a champagne flute. No garnish. * Recommended: Lunazul Blanco, Altos Olmeca Blanco, Espolòn Blanco, Herradura Silver ** Note: I use the Perlini Cocktail Cabonation System.

item.title: Packmule
item.description: Cocktail A spicy, smoky, loaded take on the Mule. 2 oz Mezcal* ¾ oz Grilled Pineapple Cordial ½ oz lime juice 15 dashes (15 ml) Habanero Tincture 2 ½ oz Ginger Beer** Add all ingredients except Ginger Beer to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Add Ginger Beer to the shaken cocktail. Double-strain over new ice in copper or tin mule mug. Garnish with a lime wheel perched on top of the drink, sprinkled with some Cayenne Salt (equal parts kosher salt and cayenne pepper)

item.title: Oaxaca Bramble
item.description: Cocktail Smoke, spice and berries make this a perfect pairing for a barbecue. Best enjoyed outside with friends. 1 oz 100% Agave Reposado Tequila* ½ oz Cinnamon-infused 80-Proof Orange Liqueur** ½ oz Mezcal*** ¾ oz lime juice 1 oz Blackberry Cordial Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain over new ice in rocks glass. Garnish with a skewered blackberry and a lime wheel. * Recommended: Altos Olmeca Reposado, Lunazul Reposado, Corralejo Reposado, Herradura Reposado **Recommended: Cointreau, Patrón Citrónge ***Recommended: Del Maguey Vida, El Silencio, Creyente Joven, Banhez Joven Espadín y Barril

item.title: Luchador
item.description: Cocktail A light-hearted prize-fighter that will win over almost any modern drinker. 1 ½ oz 100% Agave Blanco Tequila* ¾ oz Ancho Reyes Chili Liqueur ¾ oz lime juice ¾ oz Prickly Pear Cactus ¼ oz Ginger Syrup Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain over new ice in rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel perched on top of the drink, sprinkled with some finishing salt.

item.title: Appaloosa
item.description: Cocktail A spicy, lively sour with a velvety mouthfeel and a ‘green’, vegetal flavor profile. 1 ½ oz 100% Agave Reposado Tequila* ¾ oz Ancho Reyes Verde Chili Liqueur 1 oz lime juice ½ oz Pepita Orgeat Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain over new ice in rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel perched on top of the drink, sprinkled with some finishing salt.

item.title: Jungle Cat
item.description: Cocktail A smoky twist on the bitter Tiki darling the Jungle Bird, with a touch of dry heat and ample complexity from the addition of spice to the classic framework. 1 ½ oz Mezcal* ¾ oz Campari 1 ¼ oz pineapple juice ½ oz lime juice ¾ oz Caribbean Jerk Syrup Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain over new ice in a Collins glass.
